alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 10:27PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Custer and southwestern Pennington Counties through 1115 PM MDT... At 1027 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Red Shirt to near Fairburn to near Wind Cave National Park. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wind Cave National Park and Buffalo Corrals around 1035 PM MDT. Pringle around 1045 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include State Game Lodge, Custer, Hermosa, Center Lake, Black Hills Playhouse, Legion Lake, Mount Coolidge, Blue Bell, Stockade Lake, Hill City, Keystone, Hayward, Rockerville, Sylvan Lake, Black Elk Peak, Custer State Park, Jewel Cave National Monument, Palmer Gulch Resort and Horse Thief Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills
